headline.print_headline: Police Boss: Less Rhetoric, More Dialogue Needed
headline.main: Police Boss: Less Rhetoric, More Dialogue Needed

lead_paragraph: A day after the funeral of one of two police officers gunned down in their patrol car, the city's police commissioner called Sunday for a "lot less rhetoric and a lot more dialogue" to defuse the tension between police officers and the population they protect.
